price: 21. (Al-lah) castiga a quien quiere y se apiada de quien quiere; y a Él regresarán (para ser juzgados).
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayarḥamu man yashāu wa-ilayhi tuq'labūna
